SELECT e.lecture_name className ,(SUM(assignment_submit_score)/COUNT(assignment_exam_no)) AS avg FROM assignment_submit a INNER JOIN education e ON a.education_no = e.education_no INNER JOIN lecture l ON l.lecture_name = e.lecture_name
GROUP BY e.lecture_name
SELECT e.lecture_name DlectureName,(COUNT(e.lecture_name)) Dcnt FROM education e INNER JOIN drop_record d ON e.education_no = d.education_no GROUP BY e.lecture_name
SELECT lecture_name lectureName,SUM(YEAR(NOW())-YEAR(student_birth))/COUNT(student_name) cnt FROM student s INNER JOIN education e ON s.login_id = e.login_id GROUP BY lecture_name
SELECT student_gender gender,(COUNT(student_gender)/(SELECT COUNT(student_gender) FROM student))*100 cnt FROM student GROUP BY student_gender
